---
title: "Scaling Relationships"
subtitle: "Environmental Heterogeneity"
---

```{r}
library(ramp.xds)
library(ramp.work)
```


```{r sis}
load("../models/sis.rda")
sis$nHostSpecies <- 1
sis$nVectorSpecies <- 1
sis <- setup_other_variables(sis)
```

```{r}
sis_het <- setup_exposure_nb(sis, 1/50)
```

```{r scaling}
xde_scaling_eir(sis_het, 25) -> sis_het
```

```{r}
plot_eirpr(sis)
lines_eirpr(sis_het, "darkblue")
```

```{r, eval=F, echo=F}
load("../models/sis.rda")
sis$Xpar[[1]]$F_treat = F_zero
save(sis, file = "../models/sis.rda")
```
